name: Star Dust
description:
The cosmos is all that is or ever was or ever will be. You are in charge of protecting and nurturing THE STAR. Use the mouse and keyboard controls to block or feed elements to THE STAR. Keep an eye on your health and mana resources to succeed.

Made in GGJ 2020

Alexandra De los Santos - Art, UI.

Bruno Ferrari - Programmer, UI.

Clarissa Alberts - Art, FX.

Lucía Canabal - Music, Programmer.
Maximiliano Gonzáles - Programmer.
